source_objects.description: Learn about new religions, understand your spirituality, and much more.
source_objects.title: Religion & Spirituality

items.title: Introduction to the Spirit World
items.headline: An introduction to the Spirit World as was channelled from the other side
objectives_summary: Know the day to day activities of Spirits in the Spirit World
Understand what your life's purpose is
Stop fearing Death

items.title: Study the Bible (1) Avoiding 5 mistakes
items.headline: Fixing the five most significant mistakes that prevent us from learning the BIBLE correctly
objectives_summary: Will be exposed to five 'Bible study' false assumptions And you will know how to reject these thoughts.
learning new manner with which to approach studying the Bible rather than the typical scholarly way taught in school; but with more of an open heart and mind.
You'll know when it's real faith and when you're being bullied

items.title: Beginner's Course on Spirit Animals and Animal Messengers
items.headline: Learn how to communicate, decipher and learn from your Spirit Animal and Animal Messengers.
objectives_summary: You will be learn how communicate daily with your Spirit Animal
You will learn how to decipher messages given to you by Animal Messengers
You will learn how to find answers to questions you have in your life

items.title: Tarot Card Reading The Essential Course For All +CERTIFICATE
items.headline: TAROT TRAINING Level 1 How To Accurately Read Major Arcana Tarot Cards & Symbols In A Tarot Deck * CERTIFICATE INCLUDED
objectives_summary: How to Conduct a Professional Tarot Reading
Choose the Best Tarot Spread for Your Tarot Reading
Accurately Interpret the 22 Major Arcana Tarot Cards

items.title: Psychometry, Reading the 'Soul of Things'

visible_instructors.name: Linda
visible_instructors.title: Linda Rauch MARH RHom
visible_instructors.job_title: Licensed Homeopath, Psychic Medium, Tarot and Rune Reader

items.headline: Learning to read objects, crystals, photographs, trees, plants and the Art of Floramancy
objectives_summary: Techniques to learn Psychometry; Reading the 'Soul of Things'
Learn to read objects, crystals, plants, trees and flowers
Learn the History and Theory of Psychometry

items.title: The Truth Behind Slavery In The Bible
items.headline: Black & Christian
objectives_summary: Students Will Be Able To Share What The Bible Truly Says About Slavery

items.title: The 72 Names of God – Kabbalah spiritual healing - Level-2
items.headline: Implementing the 72 Divine codes for healing, transformation and connecting with Universal abundance
objectives_summary: Implementing the 72 Divine codes for healing, transformation and connecting with Universal abundance

items.title: Yin Yoga to Balance & Heal the Chakras
items.headline: An In-Depth Yin Yoga Training for Energetic and Emotional Healing
objectives_summary: Unblock and balance the seven chakras for restoring wellness on an emotional and energetic level.
Yin yoga to release tension in the body, destress, and improve flexibility.

items.title: Spirituality 101
items.headline: The Ultimate Guide To Reaching Your Highest Spiritual Potential
objectives_summary: Get access to different spiritual tools.
Become aware of the Divine around you.
Learn a simple but effective day to day spiritual practice.

items.title: Divorce & Healing in the Church: Past and Present
items.headline: Learn about divorce in the Orthodox Church from a spiritual, historical, pastoral, and canonical perspective!
objectives_summary: Better understanding of traditional, faith-based approaches to divorce

items.title: Dead Man Talking
items.headline: The incredible "Beyond this World" journey of Dr. Joe Marshalla that is very different from anything you've ever heard.
objectives_summary: You will have new skills in navigating some of the most profound understandings of your life.
You will have unique tools and models to begin guiding yourself towards fully understanding many of the dynamics that get in the way of you being truly at peace
You will learn the difference between Death and Near Death and how almost all of what most of us have heard is about people’s Near Death and not Actual Death.

items.title: Guided Meditations for Spiritual Awakening, Part 1

visible_instructors.name: Joseph
visible_instructors.title: Joseph Drumheller
visible_instructors.job_title: Leading Hypnotherapy, Meditation, Healing, and Spirituality

items.headline: Mindfulness Techniques for Compassion, Self-Acceptance, Forgiveness, Gratitude, Chakras & the Kundalini
objectives_summary: Principles behind elevating your PERSONAL VIBRATION to prepare for a SPIRITUAL AWAKENING, using GUIDED MEDITATIONS.
How to activate UNIVERSAL VIRTUES to prepare for SPIRITUAL AWAKENING.
How to activate and experience COMPASSION using GUIDED MEDITATION.

items.title: Heal the Gateways to your Soul + achieve Emotional Harmony

visible_instructors.name: Melissa
visible_instructors.title: Melissa Habibi
visible_instructors.job_title: Soul Healer, Priestess & Spiritual Purpose Coach

items.headline: Heal your emotions, awaken your Soul and create Divine Flow in your life
objectives_summary: The importance of healing your Emotions and how they are connected to your Soul
The key to releasing your emotions and overcoming emotional pain
An overview of the different emotions: Shame, Grief, Anger, Guilt & Fear

items.title: Connecting to your Spirit Guides
items.headline: Forging a relationship with your Spirit Guides, and helping them aid you in your Spiritual growth.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, you will be able to forge a relationship with your Spirit Guides.  These Spirit Guides have been with you since before you were born, and have made a contract to aid you throughout your lifetime.  Come to know your Spirit Guides and let them aid you in your spiritual growth upon this earthly plane.

items.title: Greatest Story Ever Stolen
items.headline: An exploration of the stolen legacy of Kush, Kemet, and all world religions.
objectives_summary: Be familiar with Ancient Kush and Kemetyu Spirituality, Astronomy, Astrology, and influence on Religion.

items.title: Tarot Card Reading Course - from Beginner to Professional!
items.headline: Master your Tarot & Intuitive abilities and Learn to Give Accurate Professional Level Tarot Card Readings!
objectives_summary: Tarot Card meanings for General, Love, Career, Finance readings
Tarot spreads
How to prepare for tarot readings - meditation, rituals, altar
